changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `user` ( `user_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `fname` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `mname` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `lname` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `status` varchar(2) NOT NULL, `created_dt` datetime NOT NULL, `updated_dt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `created_by` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`user_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;
